ValidityStateValid.summary: The read-only valid property of the ValidityState interface indicates if the value of an input element meets all its validation constraints, and is therefore considered to be valid.

remarks.para: If true, the element matches the :valid CSS pseudo-class; otherwise the :invalid CSS pseudo-class applies.

-ValidityState badInput, customError properties.
-Constraint validation
-Forms: Data form validation

ValidityStateValid.value: A boolean that is true if the ValidityState does conform to all the constraints.
